result.reason: The core logic for aspect ratio preservation exists (RDPResolutions.SmartSizeAspect and ApplySmartSizeAspect in RdpProtocol.cs) but is not exposed as a toggleable option in the runtime connection context menu.
result.approach: Modify ConnectionWindow.cs to add a 'Preserve Aspect Ratio' checkable menu item to the SmartSize context menu (or as a sub-option). Update RdpProtocol.cs to expose a runtime property for aspect ratio preservation that triggers ApplySmartSizeAspect() when enabled, decoupling it from the static Resolution configuration.
